title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.

title: Beef Stroganoff
summary: Tender strips of beef in a rich, creamy mushroom sauce, served over noodles or rice.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
summary: A healthy and colorful mix of vegetables stir-fried in a savory sauce.

title: Margarita Pizza
summary: A simple yet delicious pizza topped with fresh tomatoes, basil, and mozzarella.

title: Caesar Salad
summary: A crisp romaine salad with a creamy dressing, croutons, and parmesan cheese.

title: Sushi Rolls
summary: Japanese sushi rolls made with fresh fish, rice, and seaweed.

title: Lentil Soup
summary: A hearty soup made with lentils, vegetables, and spices.

title: Pancakes
summary: Fluffy pancakes served with syrup and butter.

title: Grilled Salmon
summary: Perfectly grilled salmon with a lemon butter sauce.
